items.label: Host Game
items.body: Choose Host Game, configure the options you want, and share the six-letter code with friends.

items.label: Join Game
items.body: Enter the code on the Join Game form. In VS mode you also pick a unique player color.

items.label: Cards
items.body: The default deck uses Tokyo Cam Bingo prompts. Hosts can load custom cards made in the builder with a six-letter code.

items.label: Regular Mode (up to 10 players)
items.body: Everyone receives their own 5x5 card. Tapping a tile toggles your stamp. When re-rolls are enabled the host can refresh tiles on any player's card.

items.label: VS Mode (up to 4 players)
items.body: All players share one board. Tiles are claimed in your color and you can remove your own claims, but you cannot take a square that is already stamped by someone else.

sections.title: Win Conditions
sections.description: Hosts pick one or more goals when the room is created.

items.label: Rows & Columns
items.body: Complete the lines the host enabled (Regular mode also offers 2- and 3-line variants).

items.label: Diagonals
items.body: Claim either diagonal from corner to corner.

items.label: Full Card
items.body: (Regular only) Stamp every tile on your own card.

items.label: Most Squares
items.body: Counts who has stamped the most tiles. It resolves the game automatically when the timer expires, and in VS mode when all 25 squares are claimed. Ties end the game without a winner.

items.label: Optional Countdown
items.body: The host can set a timer and then start, pause, resume, or reset it from the game screen.

items.label: Auto Result
items.body: When the timer hits zero the app checks the Most Squares condition to announce a winner or a tie.

items.label: Throw a Flag
items.body: Each player starts with two flags when they join. Use the ðŸš© button to challenge a suspicious stamp.

items.label: Group Decision
items.body: Everyone votes yes or no. A passed vote removes the challenged square from the targeted player.

items.label: Host Tool
items.body: When enabled, the host can re-roll specific tiles, rows, columns, diagonals, or entire cards.

items.label: VS Mode Impact
items.body: Refreshing the shared board clears any claimed squares in the re-rolled area so players can compete for fresh tiles.

items.label: Leaderboard
items.body: Ranks players by completed lines and total stamps in real time.

items.label: Chat
items.body: Coordinate finds and strategize with the built-in chat panel.

items.label: Streamer Mode
items.body: Toggle a cleaner layout when you are broadcasting the game.
